response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This price reflects its high quality and the benefits it can bring to you. I understand its worth to you is $8,000, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
